response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $950,000. This represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to its true market value, making it an attractive proposition. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
